text.section:
The application form shall contain provision for, and each claimant shall elect, one (1) of the following choices:
The claimant is eligible for and desires to receive a bonus payment; or
The claimant is eligible for a bonus payment but requests that his payment be deposited into a veterans' program trust fund, which is hereby established, the proceeds and interest therefrom to be used for veterans' programs.

law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 1, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 244, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 4, effective March 1, 1991. -- Created 1988 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 6.
